page.title: 01Description of Area
page.content: The area has two centres of housing. The northern part comprises private and council estates in Stanground served by adequate shops and schools. The{A605}runs through the estates and is both a physical and social barrier. This is the main route between{ {Peterborough}and east coast towns. To the south-west is the village of{ {Farcet}(pop. 400). Both areas look to{Peterborough}for employment, recreation and most other amenities. The recent opening of{ {Fletton Parkway}running to the west of the area has placed most parts of the city within easy reach. The population is a stable one, mixed working/middle class, without obvious social problems. The remainder of the area is fenland where arable farming predominates.
